titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to master William Perkins, concerning Christs descension into Hell: By John Higins
titleStmt.author: Higins, John, controversialist.
Higgins, John, fl. 1570-1602, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, printer to the Vniuersitie,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Perkins, William. An exposition of the symbole or creed of the apostles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
